summary: The Department of Defense relies on its federal blue-collar workforce to maintain and repair weapons, aircraft, electronics, and other equipment. DOD has faced longstanding recruitment and retention challenges for these positions. We found that a pay cap set by Congress on wage rates for this workforce may have contributed to these challenges. To offset these challenges, the DOD installations we reviewed used recruitment, relocation, and...
title: Defense Workforce: Efforts to Address Challenges in Recruiting and Retaining Federal Wage System Employees
